newsitem.title: USA: Ocular Sciences gets higher IPO range.
newsitem.headline: Ocular Sciences gets higher IPO range.

text.p: Underwriters for Ocular Sciences' initial public offering, set to make its market debut next week, have raised the company's estimated pricing range to $15.00 to $17.00 per share, a Securities and Exchange Commission filing indicated.
The new range marked an upswing from the initial filing range of $14.00 to $16.00. The number of shares to be offered, 7.2 million, remained unchanged.
Morgan Stanley Dean Witter is the lead underwriter on the deal.
